about_the_game:
Can you turn an out-of-business dildo shop into a profitable Cannabis empire? Of course, you can! You did it once already and now you got all that Weed Shop cash burning a hole in your pocket...

So this time, instead of going back to the grind, visit Highland and experience the High-Hospitality! Visit the brand-new dispensaries, smoke up with the locals, and enjoy the best High cuisine money can buy. Go island-hopping, explore historical sights, and see a ping bong show or two... You worked your ass off at Sunless Beach and you deserve a long and chill vacation away from all the gangs, rival dealers, trippy monsters, and degenerates. Cause it's vacation time, brothaz!

VISIT HIGHLAND!

"A place where everything is just as it seems."

content_descriptors.notes: You'll be growing and smoking Marijuana, fighting off bums, and interacting with characters in questionable outfits in no time.

detailed_description:
Can you turn an out-of-business dildo shop into a profitable Cannabis empire? Of course, you can! You did it once already and now you got all that Weed Shop cash burning a hole in your pocket...

So this time, instead of going back to the grind, visit Highland and experience the High-Hospitality! Visit the brand-new dispensaries, smoke up with the locals, and enjoy the best High cuisine money can buy. Go island-hopping, explore historical sights, and see a ping bong show or two... You worked your ass off at Sunless Beach and you deserve a long and chill vacation away from all the gangs, rival dealers, trippy monsters, and degenerates. Cause it's vacation time, brothaz!

VISIT HIGHLAND!

"A place where everything is just as it seems."
name: Weed Shop 4: Highland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: VISIT HIGHLAND! Smoke the hottest strains, have them roll your blunts and pack your bowls. After grinding it out in Sunless Beach for over 3 years you deserve a vacation, so get toasty and enjoy your 420 TRIP!
